bill.title: Companies that boycott mining, energy production, production agriculture, or commercial lumber production; State Board of Investment prohibited from investing; State Board of Investment required to divest; state of Minnesota or any state agency prohibited from entering into contracts; banks, credit unions, financial institutions, payment processors, savings and loan associations, and trust companies prohibited from discriminating against people based on subjective criteria; civil penalties provided; and report required.
bill.description: Companies that boycott mining, energy production, production agriculture, or commercial lumber production; State Board of Investment prohibited from investing; State Board of Investment required to divest; state of Minnesota or any state agency prohibited from entering into contracts; banks, credit unions, financial institutions, payment processors, savings and loan associations, and trust companies prohibited from discriminating against people based on subjective criteria; civil penalties provided; and report required.
